title: building rgtk results in compiler panic

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
I tried to set rgtk as a cargo dependency and build, but it fails with a compiler panic.

```
$ rustc --version --verbose
binary: rustc
commit-hash: a954663db66fc8efb1889beaf7bd1771ecbb9b21
commit-date: 2015-02-10 22:08:30 +0000
host: x86_64-pc-windows-gnu
release: 1.0.0-nightly
bash: $: command not found


$ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo build
   Compiling rgtk v0.0.1 (https://github.com/jeremyletang/rgtk.git#cbb9c869)
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: JoinPathsError { inner: JoinPathsError }', C:\bot\slave\nightly-dist-rustc-win-64\build\src\libcore\result.rs:743

stack backtrace:
   1:         0x69bf683b - sys::backtrace::write::h7d61c79ba3792dc3mBz
   2:         0x69c0d964 - rt::unwind::register::hd85e194c4c171711sjH
   3:         0x69b836ef - rt::unwind::begin_unwind_inner::h0e39b1f93ac3a89cKgH
   4:         0x69b83eb1 - rt::unwind::begin_unwind_fmt::h27757afb901c7a7fgfH
   5:         0x69c0d57a - rust_begin_unwind
   6:         0x69c23669 - panicking::panic_fmt::ha05377679e9c022fWqw
   7:         0x70b5ca2d - driver::collect_crate_metadata::h42ae6e6df5a04a12A3a
   8:         0x70b12036 - driver::phase_2_configure_and_expand::h184f6ffa4fc7a5eb1ta
   9:         0x70b01755 - driver::compile_input::h11fd438edb1bdc22Eba
  10:         0x70bcfd1c - run_compiler::hbd95a2d5a56f8d595bc
  11:         0x70bcd92b - run::h472f020b4c0a3240Ibc
  12:         0x70bcc63a - run::h472f020b4c0a3240Ibc
  13:         0x69c3b64c - rust_try
  14:         0x69c3b629 - rust_try
  15:         0x70bcccac - run::h472f020b4c0a3240Ibc
  16:         0x69bfe002 - sys::tcp::TcpListener::bind::h073fedc1fd3c0a2cO6C
  17:         0x779459ed - BaseThreadInitThunk

Could not compile `rgtk`.

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
```
